levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(四)

examples.english: My favorite subject is history because I like learning about the past.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的科目是歷史，因為我喜歡學習過去的事。

examples.english: This old temple has a very long and interesting history.
examples.chinese: 這座老寺廟有著非常悠久而有趣的歷史。

examples.english: We can learn many important lessons from world history.
examples.chinese: 我們可以從世界歷史中學習到許多重要的教訓。

examples.english: We learn about plants and animals in science class.
examples.chinese: 我們在科學課學習植物和動物。

examples.english: Science helps us understand how the world works.
examples.chinese: 科學幫助我們了解世界如何運作。

examples.english: Science has brought many new inventions to our lives.
examples.chinese: 科學為我們的生活帶來了許多新發明。

examples.english: We have a science lesson every Tuesday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們每個禮拜二下午都有一堂自然課。

examples.english: Please turn to Lesson Six in your English book.
examples.chinese: 請翻到你英文課本的第六課。

examples.english: This lesson teaches us about ancient history.
examples.chinese: 這課教導我們關於古代歷史。

examples.english: My favorite subject is English because it's fun.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的科目是英文，因為它很有趣。

examples.english: Math is a difficult subject for many students.
examples.chinese: 對許多學生來說，數學是一門困難的科目。

examples.english: We have seven subjects to study this semester.
examples.chinese: 我們這學期有七個科目要學習。

examples.english: We have an English test next Friday.
examples.chinese: 我們下週五有英文測驗。

examples.english: Our teacher often tests our spelling words.
examples.chinese: 我們的老師經常測驗我們的拼字單字。

examples.english: The final exam was a real test of our knowledge.
examples.chinese: 期末考是對我們知識的真正測驗。

examples.english: Summer vacation is a good time to relax and play.
examples.chinese: 暑假是放鬆和玩樂的好時光。

examples.english: My family will go on a vacation to the beach next week.
examples.chinese: 我家人下週要去海邊度假。

examples.english: After exams, students always look forward to a long vacation.
examples.chinese: 考試後，學生們總是期待一個長假。

examples.english: We usually have no school on a holiday.
examples.chinese: 我們假日通常不用上學。

examples.english: We are planning a trip for the summer holiday.
examples.chinese: 我們正在計畫暑假旅行。

examples.english: What is your favorite holiday to celebrate?
examples.chinese: 你最喜歡慶祝哪個假日？

examples.english: Teacher's Day is an important holiday to thank our teachers.教師節是一個重要的節日，用來感謝我們的老師。
Students usually give cards or small gifts on Teacher's Day.學生們通常在教師節送卡片或小禮物。
Our school held a special celebration for Teacher's Day last year.我們學校去年為教師節舉辦了一個特別的慶祝活動。
We celebrate many festivals with family and special food.
examples.chinese: 我們和家人一起用特別的食物慶祝許多節日。

examples.english: The Moon Festival is a special time for families to gather.
examples.chinese: 中秋節是家人團聚的特別時光。

examples.english: Our school will hold a fun music festival next month.
examples.chinese: 我們學校下個月將舉辦一個有趣的音樂節。

examples.english: The Moon Festival is a traditional holiday in Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 中秋節是台灣的一個傳統節日。

examples.english: We eat mooncakes and enjoy the full moon on the Moon Festival.
examples.chinese: 我們在中秋節吃月餅並欣賞滿月。

examples.english: The Moon Festival is a special time for family to gather together.
examples.chinese: 中秋節是家人團聚的特別時刻。

examples.english: She ate half of the pizza for lunch.
examples.chinese: 她午餐吃了一半的披薩。

examples.english: The movie will start in half an hour.
examples.chinese: 電影將在半小時後開始。

examples.english: Please cut the apple in half for me.
examples.chinese: 請幫我把蘋果切成兩半。

examples.english: She shared her cake and gave me a quarter of it.
examples.chinese: 她分享了她的蛋糕，並給了我四分之一。

examples.english: My favorite TV show starts at a quarter past eight.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的電視節目在八點十五分開始。

examples.english: It's a quarter to nine, so we must leave now.
examples.chinese: 現在是八點四十五分，所以我們現在必須離開。

examples.english: Please don't make so much noise in the classroom.
examples.chinese: 請不要在教室裡發出那麼多噪音。

examples.english: Suddenly, I heard a strange noise from the park.
examples.chinese: 突然間，我聽到公園裡傳來一個奇怪的聲音。

examples.english: The loud noise from the construction site was annoying.
examples.chinese: 建築工地的吵雜聲很惱人。

examples.english: The student wanted to show his best work to the teacher.
這位學生想向老師展現他最好的作品。
We went to a wonderful dance show at school last week.
我們上週去學校看了一場很棒的舞蹈表演。
He wanted to show his amazing talent during the competition.
他想在比賽中展現他驚人的才華。
The baseball game will start at 6 PM.
examples.chinese: 棒球比賽將在下午六點開始。

examples.english: Please help me start the computer.
examples.chinese: 請幫我啟動電腦。

examples.english: Let's start our journey from this point.
examples.chinese: 讓我們從這一點開始我們的旅程吧。

examples.english: You can stay here and wait for your mom.
examples.chinese: 你可以待在這裡等你媽媽。

examples.english: We will stay at a nice hotel next month.
examples.chinese: 我們下個月會住在一間很棒的飯店。

examples.english: Remember to stay safe when you go out at night.
examples.chinese: 晚上出門時，記得要保持安全。

examples.english: Ms. Chen is our new science teacher this semester.陳小姐是我們這學期的新科學老師。
Excuse me, Ms. Lin, may I ask a question?不好意思，林小姐，我可以問個問題嗎？
Please ask Ms. Wang in the office for help.請到辦公室找王小姐幫忙。
That little kid loves to eat ice cream.
examples.chinese: 那個小孩很喜歡吃冰淇淋。

examples.english: Many kids enjoy watching cartoons on TV.
examples.chinese: 很多小孩喜歡在電視上看卡通。

examples.english: The kid who lost his toy started crying.
examples.chinese: 那個弄丟玩具的小孩哭了起來。

examples.english: The happy child is playing with a toy car.
examples.chinese: 快樂的孩童正在玩玩具車。

examples.english: When I was a child, I liked to read many storybooks.
examples.chinese: 當我還是個孩童時，我喜歡讀很多故事書。

examples.english: Every child needs love and a safe place to grow up.
examples.chinese: 每個孩童都需要愛和一個安全的環境長大。

examples.english: The small boat sailed slowly on the calm lake.
examples.chinese: 這艘小船在平靜的湖面上緩緩航行。

examples.english: We took a boat trip and saw many fish in the sea.
examples.chinese: 我們搭船旅行，在海裡看到了許多魚。

examples.english: My family will rent a boat to go fishing next weekend.
examples.chinese: 我家人下週末將會租一艘船去釣魚。

examples.english: The students sat on the floor during story time.
examples.chinese: 學生們在說故事時間坐在地板上。

examples.english: Their new office is on the tenth floor of that tall building.
examples.chinese: 他們的新辦公室在那棟高樓的十樓。

examples.english: He dropped his pencil on the floor, so he had to pick it up.
examples.chinese: 他把鉛筆掉在地板上，所以他必須撿起來。

examples.english: A frisbee is a plastic disc for playing games.
examples.chinese: 飛盤是一種用來玩遊戲的塑膠圓盤。

examples.english: They like to play frisbee at the beach.
examples.chinese: 他們喜歡在海邊玩飛盤。

examples.english: My dog loves to catch the frisbee in the yard.
examples.chinese: 我的狗喜歡在院子裡接飛盤。

examples.english: My leg really hurts after I played basketball.
examples.chinese: 我的腳在我打完籃球後真的很痛。

examples.english: He accidentally hurt his hand when he fell.
examples.chinese: 他跌倒時不小心傷到了手。

examples.english: Her mean words always hurt my feelings.
examples.chinese: 她刻薄的話語總是會傷害到我的感情。

examples.english: The new school year will begin next month.
examples.chinese: 新的學年將於下個月開始。

examples.english: He began to study for the test an hour ago.
examples.chinese: 他一小時前開始為考試讀書。

examples.english: We need to begin our group project soon.
examples.chinese: 我們需要盡快開始我們的分組報告。

examples.english: I need to finish my homework before dinner.
examples.chinese: 我需要在晚餐前完成我的功課。

examples.english: The exciting basketball game finished late last night.
examples.chinese: 這場精采的籃球賽在昨晚很晚才結束。

examples.english: Don't forget to finish your breakfast before leaving home.
examples.chinese: 離開家之前，別忘了吃完你的早餐。

examples.english: A strange thing happened in our classroom this morning.
examples.chinese: 今天早上我們教室發生了一件奇怪的事情。

examples.english: I happened to see my teacher at the supermarket yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天剛好在超市遇到我的老師。

examples.english: Don't worry, nothing bad will happen to you.
examples.chinese: 別擔心，沒有什麼壞事會發生在你身上。

examples.english: My mom likes to jog in the park every morning.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽喜歡每天早上在公園慢跑。

examples.english: Jogging is a great way to stay healthy and fit.
examples.chinese: 慢跑是保持健康的好方法。

examples.english: We jogged around the school field before class.
examples.chinese: 我們上課前在學校操場慢跑。

examples.english: The cute rabbit can hop very fast across the grass.
examples.chinese: 這隻可愛的兔子可以很快地在草地上跳躍。

examples.english: We can hop on the bus to go to the park later.
examples.chinese: 我們等一下可以搭公車去公園。

examples.english: He likes to hop out of bed early on weekends.
examples.chinese: 他喜歡在週末早早地跳下床。

examples.english: My mom taught me how to cook a simple meal.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽教我如何煮一頓簡單的飯。

examples.english: Ms. Lin teaches English at our junior high school.
examples.chinese: 林老師在我們的國中教英文。

examples.english: This difficult experience taught him an important lesson.
examples.chinese: 這個困難的經驗教了他一個重要的課題。

examples.english: Learning English is very important for your future.
examples.chinese: 學習英文對你的未來非常重要。

examples.english: We have an important test next Monday.
examples.chinese: 我們下週一有個重要的考試。

examples.english: It is important to help your friends when they need it.
examples.chinese: 當你的朋友需要時，幫助他們很重要。

examples.english: Eating healthy food is important for your health.
examples.chinese: 吃健康的食物對你的健康很重要。

examples.english: His poor health made him feel tired all the time.
examples.chinese: 他不好的健康狀況讓他總是感到疲倦。

examples.english: Good mental health helps you feel happy and strong.
examples.chinese: 良好的心理健康幫助你感到快樂和堅強。

examples.english: My mom is healthy because she exercises every day.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽很健康，因為她每天都運動。

examples.english: Eating fruits and vegetables every day keeps us healthy.
examples.chinese: 每天吃水果和蔬菜能讓我們保持健康。

examples.english: Getting enough sleep is a healthy habit for everyone.
examples.chinese: 獲得充足的睡眠對每個人來說都是健康的習慣。

examples.english: She felt weak after being sick for a week.
examples.chinese: 她生病一週後感到很虛弱。

examples.english: This old bridge is weak and might fall down.
examples.chinese: 這座舊橋很虛弱，可能會倒塌。

examples.english: His excuse for not doing homework was very weak.
examples.chinese: 他沒寫功課的藉口很虛弱。

examples.english: The weather was terrible yesterday, so we couldn't go out.
examples.chinese: 昨天天氣很糟，所以我們不能出去。

examples.english: They heard a terrible noise from the abandoned house last night.
examples.chinese: 他們昨晚從那棟廢棄的房子裡聽到一個可怕的聲音。

examples.english: He made a terrible mistake on the exam and felt very sad.
examples.chinese: 他在考試中犯了一個嚴重的錯誤，感覺非常難過。

examples.english: The comedian was very funny, and his jokes made us all laugh.
examples.chinese: 這位喜劇演員很好笑，他的笑話讓我們所有人都笑了。

examples.english: There was a funny noise coming from the old car engine.
examples.chinese: 老汽車的引擎發出了一種奇怪的聲音。

examples.english: My teacher told us a funny story about her cat.
examples.chinese: 我的老師跟我們說了一個關於她貓咪的有趣故事。

examples.english: There are a lot of students in my class.
examples.chinese: 我的班級裡有很多學生。

examples.english: My brother likes to play sports a lot.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥很喜歡運動。

examples.english: Today's weather is a lot better than yesterday.
examples.chinese: 今天的天氣比昨天好很多。

examples.english: The class already began ten minutes ago.
examples.chinese: 課堂已經在十分鐘前開始了。

examples.english: We are already tired from playing all day.
examples.chinese: 我們玩了一整天，已經累了。

examples.english: I have already seen this movie before.
examples.chinese: 我以前已經看過這部電影了。

examples.english: I just finished my homework. (我剛才寫完功課。)
I just have one sister. (我只有一個妹妹。)
This shoe is just my size. (這雙鞋的尺寸剛好是我的。)
Why did you miss the English class yesterday?
examples.chinese: 你昨天為什麼錯過英文課了？

examples.english: Can you tell me why you want to visit Japan?
examples.chinese: 你可以告訴我你為什麼想去日本嗎？

examples.english: If you are bored, why not read a good book?
examples.chinese: 如果你很無聊，何不讀一本好書呢？

examples.english: We bought a comfortable new couch for our living room.
examples.chinese: 我們為客廳買了一張舒服的新沙發。

examples.english: After school, I like to relax on the couch and read a book.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我喜歡在沙發上放鬆並讀書。

examples.english: My cat always sleeps on the old couch in the corner.
examples.chinese: 我的貓總是在角落那張舊沙發上睡覺。

examples.english: Please give me the red pen on the table.
examples.chinese: 請把桌上的紅筆給我。

examples.english: My best friend gave me a cute present yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我最好的朋友昨天送我一個可愛的禮物。

examples.english: Our teacher always gives us good advice for studying.
examples.chinese: 我們的老師總是給我們很好的學習建議。

examples.english: There are many colorful flowers in our garden.
examples.chinese: 我們的花園裡有許多色彩繽紛的花。

examples.english: We will play games in the school garden next week.
examples.chinese: 我們下週會在學校花園裡玩遊戲。

examples.english: My grandparents grow fresh vegetables in their small garden.
examples.chinese: 我的祖父母在他們的小花園裡種植新鮮蔬菜。

examples.english: The cow likes to eat fresh green grass in the field.
examples.chinese: 牛喜歡在田裡吃新鮮的綠草。

examples.english: We had a picnic on the soft grass in the park yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天下午在公園柔軟的草地上野餐。

examples.english: My brother needs to cut the tall grass in our backyard this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥這個週末需要修剪我們後院裡很高的草。

examples.english: We put fresh fruit in the refrigerator.
examples.chinese: 我們把新鮮水果放進冰箱。

examples.english: He took a cold drink from the refrigerator.
examples.chinese: 他從冰箱裡拿了一杯冷飲。

examples.english: Our old refrigerator is broken, so we need a new one.
examples.chinese: 我們舊的冰箱壞了，所以我們需要一個新的。

examples.english: The police help people and keep order in the city.
examples.chinese: 警察幫助人們並維護城市裡的秩序。

examples.english: We saw a police car driving fast down the street.
examples.chinese: 我們看到一輛警車在街上快速行駛。

examples.english: If you need help, you should call the police immediately.
examples.chinese: 如果你需要幫助，你應該立刻打電話給警察。

examples.english: An officer helped the lost child find his way home.
examples.chinese: 一位警官幫助那個迷路的小孩找到回家的路。

examples.english: My uncle is an army officer, serving his country.
examples.chinese: 我的叔叔是一名軍官，他正在為國家服務。

examples.english: She wants to be a public officer and serve the community.
examples.chinese: 她想成為一名公務員，為社區服務。

examples.english: My sister wants to be a famous actress in the future.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹未來想成為一位有名的女演員。

examples.english: The young actress played a kind doctor in the new movie.
examples.chinese: 那位年輕的女演員在新電影中飾演一位善良的醫生。

examples.english: Many people think that she is a talented actress.
examples.chinese: 許多人認為她是一位有才華的女演員。

examples.english: My mother is a writer; she writes many books.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽是一位作家；她寫了很多書。

examples.english: The famous writer won an award for her new novel.
examples.chinese: 那位著名的作家因為她的小說獲得了一個獎項。

examples.english: Many students dream of becoming a famous writer someday.
examples.chinese: 許多學生夢想著有朝一日成為一名著名作家。

examples.english: My mom is a reporter and she works for a TV station.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽是記者，她在電視台工作。

examples.english: The reporter asked many questions about the new policy.
examples.chinese: 那位記者問了許多關於新政策的問題。

examples.english: A brave reporter went to the earthquake area to report the news.
examples.chinese: 一位勇敢的記者去了地震災區報導新聞。

examples.english: The old fisherman sails his boat early every morning.
examples.chinese: 那位老漁夫每天早上很早就駕船出海。

examples.english: A strong fisherman pulled a big fish from the sea.
examples.chinese: 一位強壯的漁夫從海裡拉起一條大魚。

examples.english: My grandfather was a fisherman, and he loved the sea.
examples.chinese: 我的爺爺是個漁夫，他熱愛大海。

examples.english: My father works in a factory that makes computers.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸在一間製造電腦的工廠工作。

examples.english: This new factory will produce many smartphones next year.
examples.chinese: 這間新工廠明年會生產許多智慧型手機。

examples.english: We took a tour to see how the chocolate factory works.
examples.chinese: 我們參加了導覽，去看看那間巧克力工廠是如何運作的。

examples.english: I didn't understand, so please explain it again.
examples.chinese: 我沒聽懂，所以請你再解釋一次。

examples.english: He wants to visit the park again next week.
examples.chinese: 他下週想再去參觀那個公園。

examples.english: After the rain, the sun came out again.
examples.chinese: 雨後，太陽又出來了。

examples.english: Please mail this important package for me.
examples.chinese: 請幫我郵寄這個重要的包裹。

examples.english: Did you receive any interesting mail today?
examples.chinese: 你今天有收到什麼有趣的信件嗎？

examples.english: She checks her mail every morning before school.
examples.chinese: 她每天早上上學前都會檢查她的信件。

examples.english: The mailman delivers letters to our house every day.
examples.chinese: 郵差每天送信到我們家。

examples.english: Yesterday, the mailman left a package for us.
examples.chinese: 昨天，郵差為我們留下了一個包裹。

examples.english: My dog always barks loudly at the mailman.
examples.chinese: 我的狗總是對著郵差大聲吠叫。

examples.english: She always wears warm gloves in cold winter.
examples.chinese: 她在寒冷的冬天總是戴著保暖手套。

examples.english: He used his new baseball glove to catch the ball.
examples.chinese: 他用他的新棒球手套接住了球。

examples.english: You should wear rubber gloves when washing dishes.
examples.chinese: 洗碗時你應該戴上橡膠手套。

examples.english: She wears a beautiful gold ring on her finger.
examples.chinese: 她手上戴著一個漂亮的金戒指。

examples.english: My father bought a new ring for my mother.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸為我媽媽買了一個新戒指。

examples.english: This silver ring is a special gift for me.
examples.chinese: 這個銀戒指是我特別的禮物。

examples.english: Please use this strong rope to tie the box safely.
examples.chinese: 請用這條結實的繩子把盒子綁好。

examples.english: We love to play jump rope together during recess time.
examples.chinese: 我們喜歡在下課時間一起跳繩。

examples.english: The climbers needed a long rope to go down the cliff.
examples.chinese: 登山者需要一條長繩才能下懸崖。

examples.english: You should take your medicine after meals every day.
examples.chinese: 你應該每天飯後吃藥。

examples.english: She wants to study medicine at a good university.
examples.chinese: 她想在好大學學習醫學。

examples.english: Modern medicine has greatly improved human health.
examples.chinese: 現代醫學大大改善了人類健康。

examples.english: My stomach felt full after eating a big meal.
examples.chinese: $ 我的胃吃了一大餐後覺得很飽。

examples.english: The doctor checked his stomach carefully during the exam.
examples.chinese: $ 醫生檢查時仔細地檢查了他的腹部。

examples.english: Drinking too much coffee can sometimes upset your stomach.
examples.chinese: $ 喝太多咖啡有時會讓你的胃不舒服。

examples.english: I have a fever and feel very tired.
examples.chinese: 我發燒了，而且覺得很累。

examples.english: If you have a fever, you should drink more water.
examples.chinese: 如果你發燒了，應該多喝水。

examples.english: The whole school had soccer fever before the big game.
examples.chinese: 大賽前，整個學校都感染了足球熱。

examples.english: I have a sore throat, so it hurts when I swallow.
examples.chinese: 我喉嚨痛，所以吞嚥時會痛。

examples.english: The water was cold and felt good going down my throat.
examples.chinese: 水很冰，流過我的喉嚨時感覺很舒服。

examples.english: He cleared his throat and then began to speak clearly.
examples.chinese: 他清了清喉嚨，然後開始清晰地說話。

examples.english: My legs are sore after running for an hour.
examples.chinese: 我的腿跑了一個小時後很痠痛。

examples.english: I have a sore throat, so I can't talk loudly.
examples.chinese: 我喉嚨痛，所以不能大聲說話。

examples.english: His finger is sore because he hit it on the door.
examples.chinese: 他的手指很痛，因為他撞到了門。

examples.english: Learning a new language can be fun and useful.
examples.chinese: 學習一種新的語言可以很有趣且有用。

examples.english: Language helps us share our thoughts and feelings with others.
examples.chinese: 語言幫助我們與他人分享想法和感受。

examples.english: The teacher used simple language to explain the difficult concept.
examples.chinese: 老師使用簡單的語言來解釋這個困難的概念。

examples.english: The famous band will play at the concert tonight.
examples.chinese: 這個有名的樂團今晚將在演唱會表演。

examples.english: My sister wants to join a school band to play drums.
examples.chinese: 我姊姊想加入學校樂團打鼓。

examples.english: Our favorite rock band released a new album last month.
examples.chinese: 我們最喜歡的搖滾樂團上個月發行了新專輯。

examples.english: My brother has a new drum set, and he practices daily.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥有一套新鼓，他每天練習。

examples.english: She can drum very well, even though she is young.
examples.chinese: 儘管她很年輕，她還是能把鼓打得很好。

examples.english: He began to drum his fingers on the table impatiently.
examples.chinese: 他開始不耐煩地用手指敲桌子。

examples.english: We will have a picnic at the park this Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我們這週六將在公園野餐。

examples.english: It was a wonderful picnic with delicious food and games.
examples.chinese: 那是一次很棒的野餐，有美味的食物和遊戲。

examples.english: Let's picnic by the lake when the weather is good.
examples.chinese: 天氣好的時候，我們去湖邊野餐吧。

examples.english: The little goat jumped happily in the green field.
examples.chinese: 那隻小山羊在綠色的田野裡開心地跳著。

examples.english: Goats can climb steep mountains and rocky hills easily.
examples.chinese: 山羊可以輕鬆地攀爬陡峭的山和多岩石的山丘。

examples.english: My grandmother often drinks fresh goat milk every morning.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶每天早上都常喝新鮮的羊奶。

examples.english: He gave his mother a beautiful red rose for her birthday. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 他送給他媽媽一朵美麗的紅玫瑰作為生日禮物。

examples.english: The rose in our garden smells so sweet every spring. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 我們花園裡的玫瑰花每個春天都聞起來很香。

examples.english: Roses are popular flowers and often symbolize love. (8 words)
examples.chinese: 玫瑰是受歡迎的花，也常象徵著愛情。

examples.english: My new English teacher is a foreigner from Canada.
examples.chinese: 我的新英文老師是個來自加拿大的外國人。

examples.english: We saw many foreigners taking pictures at Taipei 101.
examples.chinese: 我們看到許多外國人在台北101拍照。

examples.english: It's fun to meet foreigners and learn about their cultures.
examples.chinese: 認識外國人並學習他們的文化很有趣。

examples.english: I sent an e-mail to my teacher yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天寄了一封電子郵件給我的老師。

examples.english: You can contact me by e-mail or text message.
examples.chinese: 你可以用電子郵件或簡訊聯絡我。

examples.english: Please e-mail me the photos of the trip.
examples.chinese: 請將旅行的照片電子郵件給我。

examples.english: I like to put honey in my tea every morning.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡每天早上在茶裡加蜂蜜。

examples.english: Come here, honey, it's time for dinner now.
examples.chinese: 親愛的，過來這裡，現在是吃晚餐的時間了。

examples.english: What do you want for breakfast, honey?
examples.chinese: 親愛的，你早餐想吃什麼？

examples.english: Dear Grandma, I hope you are doing well.
親愛的奶奶，希望您一切安好。
My dog is very dear to me; I love her so much.
我的狗對我來說非常親愛；我好愛牠。
Please wait for me, dear; I'll be right back.
親愛的，請等我一下；我馬上回來。
We have a common interest in reading books.
examples.chinese: 我們有共同的閱讀興趣。

examples.english: Seeing stray cats is a common sight in our neighborhood.
examples.chinese: 在我們的社區，看到流浪貓是很普遍的景象。

examples.english: Air pollution is a common problem in big cities.
examples.chinese: 空氣污染在大城市是一個普遍的問題。

examples.english: My little sister loves to play with her toys.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹喜歡玩她的玩具。

examples.english: There is little milk left in the bottle.
examples.chinese: 瓶子裡剩下很少牛奶了。

examples.english: He has little interest in reading books.
examples.chinese: 他對閱讀書籍沒什麼興趣。

examples.english: A ruler helps you draw a straight line on paper.
examples.chinese: 尺子可以幫助你在紙上畫一條直線。

examples.english: Please walk straight ahead to find the park.
examples.chinese: 請一直往前走就能找到公園。

examples.english: After school, I went straight home to finish my homework.
examples.chinese: 放學後，我直接回家完成作業。
